name: bun-lmdb-connector
description: Library for working with LMDB in Bun

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && bun build src/index.ts --target=node --outdir=dist && tsc && cp dist/index.js dist/index.mjs && cp src/package.json dist/ && cp src/README.md dist/
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && git checkout dist && git merge main && git push origin dist

author: Alexy Os
